game.entity

Class Crop

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.entity.Crop

  • public class Crop
extends java.lang.Object
    A Crop represents a plant with a name, cost, time, xp, minYield, maxYield and salePrice

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int cost 
      private int maxYield 
      private int minYield 
      private java.lang.String name 
      private int salePrice 
      private int time 
      private int xp 

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a Crop object with the specified name, cost, time, xp, minYield, maxYield and salePrice

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Shows the time in ? hours, ? mins format

      • Crop

        public Crop(java.lang.String name,
            int cost,
            int time,
            int xp,
            int minYield,
            int maxYield,
            int salePrice)
        Creates a Crop object with the specified name, cost, time, xp, minYield, maxYield and salePrice
        Parameters:
        name - the crop's name
        cost - the crop's cost
        time - the crop's harvest time
        xp - the crop's xp
        minYield - the crop's minYield
        maxYield - the crop's maxYield
        salePrice - the crop's salePrice
